description:
This course will guide you all the way through setting up your cPanel Reseller account or your cPanel VPS/Dedicated server to start selling web hosting services.

Included in this course:

  1. FULL cPanel backup file of the model website built all through out the course (including all open source modules used in the website).
  2. The Getting and Managing your First 1,000 Clients in Web Hosting book - PDF Copy valued at $47
  3. One year (1 year) free access of the Open Knowledge base service as shown in this course to provide to your own end customers. The Open KB includes additional videos added daily on the subject of coding, server management, and day to day web hosting business operations.
title: Launching a Web Hosting Business from Scratch
